name: 毛敬豪
objective:
資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹，基礎密碼學介紹，電腦病毒與惡意程式，網路安全與攻擊，網路安全防護，應用層安全，網頁安全，雲端安全，物聯網安全，個人資料保護
Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection
schedule:
week 1~ week 5: introduction
week 6~ week 14: shell code practice
week 15~ week 18: final and workshop
scorePolicy:
期中作業 30%
期末作業 40%
平時成績 30%
materials: Cybersecurity Ops with bash, Attack, Defend, and Analyze from the Command Line, Orielly, Paul Troncone & Carl Albing (2019)
